input_text.Prompt:
Item name:
Magnaflow 35168 Stainless Steel 2.25" Exhaust Tip

Item features:
Reduces exhaust gas pressure and enhances the performance of the exhaust system
Manufactured from high-strength stainless steel
Mirror-like finish
Easy to install
Corrosion resistant
Backed by a lifetime warranty

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Magnaflow Stainless Steel 2.25" Exhaust Tip is designed to reduce exhaust gas pressure and enhance the performance of the exhaust system. It is manufactured from high-strength stainless steel and comes in a mirror-like finish. This exhaust tip features a 2.25-inch tip. It is corrosion-resistant, easy to install, and backed by a lifetime warranty.
input_text.Response B: This version of the Bliss pump and stiletto from Pleaser will charm everyone that you come near. Its sculpted silhouette and tall heel and platform add a sexy appeal to anything you have on, especially as it lengthens your legs. The glossy upper and adjustable strap add a certain edginess to any occasion. Stiletto Heel Height: Approx. 4 1/4'' Tall. Mini platform pumps Heel Height: Approx 3/4". D'Orsay Style. Heels are made of 100% synthetic material with Leopard print pony hair on the outer portion of the heel. Shoes run approximately 1/2 size small.

label_annotations.factors_b: B talks about legs and stilletos. not on subject at all.
label_annotations.feedback: Not sure what response B was doing!
